page.title: 07SHILDON WORKING MENS' CLUB
page.content: {Shildon Working Mens' Club}is in {Redworth Road.}It has two floors, the top floor is for entertainment nights when there are pop groups,comedians and other acts.The lower floor has bars and lounges.My Dad is the entertainment organiser who books all of the acts and looks after them when they arrive. On Saturdays the organist comes to play for the ballroom dancers. During the week you can play bingo and have a drink with your friends.The lounge is only opened on Saturday nights and Sunday mornings and evenings. There is a juke box in the lounge so you can play pop music or old-time music,but most people who go to the Club prefer pop music.The Club has a lot of members, they prefer to go there rather than to the pubs because it is{convenient and the } {prices of drinks are less. }
